keyFacts: The document is a government letter listing eight attorneys (Brad Edwards, Stan Pottinger, Gloria Allred, Sigrid McCawley, Alex Conlon, Bob Josefsberg, Kimberly Lerner, Teri Gibbs) known to represent victims in the Jeffrey Epstein criminal case.

The letter confirms the government made efforts to notify victims of a court proceeding scheduled for August 27, 2019, but acknowledges not all victims are represented and some may attend without the government's knowledge.
The letter was sent by Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey to Judge Richard M. Berman and intentionally not copied to defense counsel to protect victim privacy.
The case referenced is United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), indicating it is a 2019 criminal case in the Southern District of New York.
